survey_name: Adoption of AI-Powered Personalized Nutrition Planning Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate user adoption, satisfaction, and preferences regarding AI-powered personalized nutrition planning services.

questions.question_text: Are you currently using an AI-powered personalized nutrition planning service?
answer_options: I have used one in the past but not currently
questions.client_notes: Use a simple single-choice question to segment users effectively. Ensure mobile-friendly design.
